entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. 60 percent chance of snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
